'''v0.2.2 alpha''' is a minor update to ''[[Pocket Edition|Minecraft: Pocket Edition]]'' that was released on March 17, 2012 to fix some of the bugs and crashes in v0.2.1 alpha2.<ref name=":0"/> This version was released for Android devices only.

== Fixes ==
*Fixed a bug where the game would not open properly on some devices.
*Fixed a bug that occurred on the Acer Iconia A500 tablet.

== Internal version ==
The internal version is 0.2.2(2025), and the size is 2.83 MB.</onlyinclude>
